channel.title: An aptly named blog
channel.description: Recent content on An aptly named blog

item.title: Using an Azure Database for PostgreSQL server with RedwoodJS
item.description: Intro I had several titles in mind for this post: Adding the A to RedwoodJS-style RPG (React, Prisma, GraphQL) with Azure ⚔ (going to pin this one in a corner, just in case) Taking the RedwoodJS tutorial wheels off and using an Azure database 🚲 RedwoodJS 🤝 Azure PostgreSQL Setting up a database with RedwoodJS for noobs: Azure PostgreSQL edition 🐤 … And yet, I settled with the most boring one.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am Kim-Adeline Miguel (she/her), and this is the about page for my blog. 💼 As for my day job, I am currently a software engineer at Microsoft on the Python extension for VS Code team. 🌌 Other corners of the internet where you can find me: kimadeline kimadelinemiguel (first name last name) kimadeline_m (kimadeline was taken 😞) kimadeline (spoiler: it’s empty) 🌵 This blog is powered by Hugo, with a customized version of the Cactus theme.
